level.heading: Grievance procedure.
level.text: The Mayor shall direct the Office of Human Rights to establish and maintain a procedure to receive grievances or complaints alleging violations of the Federal Act from participants and other interested or affected parties. The procedure shall be in accordance with section 181(c) of the Federal Act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-150, see notes following ยง 32-1601.
